description: At HCSC, we consider our employees the cornerstone of our business and the foundation to our success. We enable employees to craft their career with curated development plans that set their learning path to a rewarding and fulfilling career.Come join us and be part of a purpose driven company who is invested in your future!Job SummaryBASIC FUNCTION:This position is responsible for creating reports, insights and analytics in support of the division; creating specifications for reports and analysis based on business needs; possibly providing consultation to users and leading cross-functional teams to address the division’s issues; producing datasets and reports for analysis using system reporting tools; possibly performing research and assisting in analyzing data related to the division’s strategic initiatives and broader research needs; interfacing between the business and divisional data teams to generate tools to be leveraged in building analysis and reports which are actionable within the business environment; working closely with customers to build relationships; and continuously gaining a deeper understanding of the division’s data in order to meet business needs; analyzing complex business problems and issues using data from internal and external sources to provide insight to decision-makers; identifying and interpreting trends and patterns in datasets to locate influences.JOB REQUIREMENTS:Bachelor Degree and 4 years’ experience in data analysis and information reporting data OR 6 year experience in data analysis and information reporting data.Experience utilizing SQL, SAS, Teradata or other reporting tools / languages.Communicate technical concepts to non-technical audiences both in written and verbal form.Lead projects and junior analyst.Initiative to solve complex problems; takes an “outside –in” perspective to identify innovative solutions.May lead functional teams or projects or decisions to support business needs for reporting and insights.Work with both internal and external data.Verify accuracy of reports and provide insights.Work independently, with guidance in only the most complex situations.Knowledge of project portfolio management and related reporting and IT operational reporting.Exposure to managing teams operating under reporting as a service model.Accountability around decision support and analysis around program and project delivery.Are you being referred to one of our roles?
